description: Translate only when one of wc, vt OR im is not NULL
Concatenates five attributes to create CAS_ID
Check there is a value. Translation converts source attributes into 4-character wetland code and returns the code corresponding to the first character.
Check there is a value. Translation converts source attributes into 4-character wetland code and returns the code corresponding to the second character.
Check there is a value.. Translation converts source attributes into 4-character wetland code and returns the code corresponding to the third character.
Check there is a value. Translation converts source attributes into 4-character wetland code and returns the code corresponding to the fourth character.
